X-Y Correlation and Statistical Tests for multiple categories using data.table

dth_cor.Rd

X-Y Correlation and Statistical Tests for multiple categories using data.table

dth_cor(
  DT,
  x,
  y,
  by,
  method = "spearman",
  alternative = "two.sided",
  exact = NULL,
  conf.level = 0.95,
  continuity = FALSE,
  trim = TRUE
)

Arguments

DT
x
y
by
method
alternative
exact
conf.level
continuity
trim

Examples

require(data.table)
#> Loading required package: data.table
DT <- as.data.table(iris)
# uses spearman method by default
dth_cor(DT, x = 'Sepal.Length', y = 'Sepal.Width', by = 'Species')
#> Warning: Cannot compute exact p-value with ties
#>       Species statistic parameter      p.value  estimate null.value alternative
#> 1:     setosa  5095.097        NA 2.316710e-10 0.7553375          0   two.sided
#> 2: versicolor 10045.855        NA 1.183863e-04 0.5176060          0   two.sided
#> 3:  virginica 11942.793        NA 2.010675e-03 0.4265165          0   two.sided
#>                             method data.name                variables
#> 1: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 2: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 3: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width

# set trim = F if you want all the extra information (mostly useless)
dth_cor(DT, x = 'Sepal.Length', y = 'Sepal.Width', by = 'Species',trim = FALSE)
#> Warning: Cannot compute exact p-value with ties
#>       Species statistic parameter      p.value  estimate null.value alternative
#> 1:     setosa  5095.097        NA 2.316710e-10 0.7553375          0   two.sided
#> 2: versicolor 10045.855        NA 1.183863e-04 0.5176060          0   two.sided
#> 3:  virginica 11942.793        NA 2.010675e-03 0.4265165          0   two.sided
#>                             method data.name                variables
#> 1: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 2: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 3: Spearman's rank correlation rho        DT Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
